summary: New vary, but subdued textures for caves...
descriptionHtml:
I never liked the \"too green\" textures in caves. Buried in my PC and chose interesting DDS files to the caves is. Now the caves are visible growths of other rocks (sandstone) or overgrown with algae, stones, plus ceilings are now slightly overgrown with moss and algae (all suitably subdued) Caves also received new textures to the ground. In my opinion they look much better now.

You have a choice of 2 wersions walls  (with glow or no glowing)
If u like this rebuild please endorse...

(I do not know why, but my screens came out darker than they are in the game :/)

IMPORTANT - to see what they were all effects are included in the package before copying the folder please make sure that the folder \"caves\" in your game is empty!

MY OTHERS MODS

author: vito740
